name: Trollkin Fire Shaman
description: A medium humanoid with an affinity for fire magic, the Trollkin Fire Shaman possesses thick skin and wields a staff for melee combat while also able to cast powerful fire spells.
memorable: The ability to teleport while wreathed in flames allows for tactical repositioning and the potential to deal area damage when taking hits.
goals: Utilizes fire magic for combat and to hinder foes, while also relying on regeneration to endure battles.
relations: Often found in the company of other fire-themed creatures, or serving as a shamanic leader among Trollkin.
environment: Typically found in volcanic regions, fire-themed terrains, or among other Trollkin.
strengths: Possesses regeneration abilities and strong ranged fire attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to acid and fire, which negates its regeneration.
attacks: Employs multiattack strategy with Mark Foe, unleashing Hurl Flame or staff strikes for damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fiery Escape allows for tactical teleportation and area damage when taking damage.
equipment: Wields a staff for melee combat.
senses: Has a passive perception of 15, making it quite perceptive.
skills: Skilled in perception with a +3 modifier, aiding in spotting hidden creatures.
additional_information: Can regain 3 hit points at the start of its turn except when taking acid or fire damage.
Ability to inflict additional fire damage through the Mark Foe ability.
Thick skin grants a bonus to its armor class, enhancing its defenses.
Uses fire magic for ranged and area attacks, making it a formidable foe.
Possesses a unique teleport ability that increases its tactical options in combat.
spellcasting: Can cast fire spells dealing significant damage at a distance.
